hero.label: Everything you need to know
hero.subtitle: This isn't red tape. I want your tattoo to be perfect and last a lifetime. Read this before you come in.

intro.text: Look, getting a tattoo is a big decision. And I want it to be an experience you remember fondly, not with regret. That's why I need you to read this.

preTattoo.title: I want to get a tattoo

before.label: Before you come
before.title: Prepare well
before.subtitle: Your body is my canvas. Take care of it before your appointment.

sleep.title: Sleep well
sleep.desc: Your skin regenerates while you sleep. A sleepless night = irritated skin = harder tattoo.

eat.title: Eat something
eat.desc: Don't come on an empty stomach. Blood sugar drops, you get dizzy, we have to stop. Eat 1-2 hours before.

hydrate.title: Stay hydrated
hydrate.desc: Hydrated skin absorbs ink better. Drink water in the days before. Your tattoo will thank you.

alcohol.title: No alcohol
alcohol.desc: Alcohol dilates blood vessels. More bleeding = worse result. 24 hours sober before the appointment.

clothes.title: Comfortable clothes
clothes.desc: You'll be still for a while. Wear clothes that allow easy access to the area and let you relax.

lotion.title: No lotions
lotion.desc: Don't apply creams or lotions to the area on the day. The skin needs to be clean and dry.

during.label: The day of
during.title: Trust the process
during.subtitle: You're here now. Just enjoy it.

time.title: Arrive on time
time.desc: 10 minutes early is perfect. You can relax, we review the design together, and start without rushing.

snacks.title: Bring snacks
snacks.desc: For longer sessions, bring something to nibble and water. A bar, nuts, whatever you like.

entertainment.title: Entertainment
entertainment.desc: Headphones, a book, your favorite show on your phone. Whatever helps you disconnect.

breaks.title: Ask for breaks
breaks.desc: If you need a rest, just say so. I'd rather stop for 5 minutes than tattoo someone uncomfortable.

trust.title: Trust me
trust.desc: I've tattooed hundreds of pieces. I know what I'm doing. Relax and let me create something beautiful for you.

after.label: Aftercare
after.title: Make it last forever
after.subtitle: The first few days are crucial. Take care of it and it'll last a lifetime.

phase1.title: First 48 hours
items: Leave the bandage on for 2-4 hours (or as instructed)
Pat dry with clean paper towel, don't rub
Apply a thin layer of healing ointment

avoid.title: Avoid this
items: Pools, hot tubs, and baths for 2 weeks

week1.label: Days 1-3
week1.desc: Redness and swelling is normal. Your skin is healing.

week2.label: Days 4-7
week2.desc: It starts peeling. DON'T scratch no matter how much it itches.

week3.label: Weeks 2-3
week3.desc: Outer layer heals. May look milky, that's normal.

week4.label: Week 4+
week4.desc: Fully healed. Your tattoo is now settled.

cta.title: Ready to make it real?
cta.subtitle: You know everything you need. Now it's time to take the leap.

home.title: Seaphiya | Fine Line Tattoo Artist in Miami

success.title: Request Sent

notFound.title: Off the line
notFound.subtitle: Page not found
notFound.description: This path wasn't in the design. Let's get back to creating.

step1.title: Your Vision
step1.subtitle: Tell me about your dream tattoo
